info.label: Software Developer
info.brief: As a 5 years experienced security expert, network consultant, infrastructure builder and developer, Jie-Ren is experienced in developing secure enterprise software and building high scalability H/A product, while experienced in all kind of virtual cloud platform, hypervisor and infrastructure from AWS, Azure, vmware, docker to serverless architecture. Jie-Ren is also familiar with Agile and DevOps process, with experience of hosting container-based web service on AWS.
